$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/delay.js.title: $:/plugins/oflg/fishing/delay.js

$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/due.js.title: $:/plugins/oflg/fishing/due.js

$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/excisefish.js.title: $:/plugins/oflg/fishing/excisefish.js

$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/fishfold.title: $:/plugins/oflg/fishing/fishfold
$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/fishfold.text:
<$reveal
  default={{$:/temp/fishing!!fish}}
  type="match"
  text=<<currentTiddler>>
  animate="yes"
>
  <!-- Copy from TW's core/ui/ViewTemplate/unfold.tid -->
  <$reveal
    tag="div"
    type="nomatch"
    stateTitle=<<folded-state>>
    text="hide"
    default="show"
    retain="yes"
    animate="yes"
  >
    <$button
      tooltip={{$:/language/Buttons/Fold/Hint}}
      aria-label={{$:/language/Buttons/Fold/Caption}}
      class="tc-fold-banner"
    >
      <$action-sendmessage
        $message="tm-fold-tiddler"
        $param=<<currentTiddler>>
        foldedState=<<folded-state>>
      />
      {{$:/core/images/chevron-up}}
    </$button>
  </$reveal>
  <$reveal
    tag="div"
    type="nomatch"
    stateTitle=<<folded-state>>
    text="show"
    default="show"
    retain="yes"
    animate="yes"
  >
    <$button
      tooltip={{$:/language/Buttons/Unfold/Hint}}
      aria-label={{$:/language/Buttons/Unfold/Caption}}
      class="tc-unfold-banner"
    >
      <$action-sendmessage
        $message="tm-fold-tiddler"
        $param=<<currentTiddler>>
        foldedState=<<folded-state>>
      />
      {{$:/core/images/chevron-down}}
    </$button>
  </$reveal>
</$reveal>

$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/fishhead.title: $:/plugins/oflg/fishing/fishhead
$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/fishhead.text:
<$reveal class="fishing-head" default={{{[all[current]tag[?]then[1]else[0]]=[all[current]has[due]then[1]else[0]]=[{$:/temp/fishing!!fish}matchthen[1]else[0]]+[match[1]]}}} type="nomatch" text="" animate="yes" >
<$reveal state=<> type="match" text="hide" animate="yes" > <> <$list filter="[[?]][all[current]tags[]sort[title]]-[all[current]backlinks[]]" template="$:/core/ui/TagTemplate" storyview="pop" />
<>

$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/fishing.title: $:/plugins/oflg/fishing/fishing
$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/fishing.text:
<$reveal default={{$:/temp/fishing!!fish}} type="match" text=<> animate="yes" > <$reveal state=<> type="nomatch" text="hide" animate="yes" > <$let easybonus={{{[{$:/temp/fishing!!fishingrod}addprefix[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/fishingrod/]getindex[easybonus]else{$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/fishingrod!!easybonus}]}}} graduatinginterval={{{[{$:/temp/fishing!!fishingrod}addprefix[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/fishingrod/]getindex[graduatinginterval]else{$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/fishingrod!!graduatinginterval}]}}} hardinterval={{{[{$:/temp/fishing!!fishingrod}addprefix[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/fishingrod/]getindex[hardinterval]else{$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/fishingrod!!hardinterval}]}}} intervalmodifier={{{[{$:/temp/fishing!!fishingrod}addprefix[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/fishingrod/]getindex[intervalmodifier]else{$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/fishingrod!!intervalmodifier}]}}} maximuminterval={{{[{$:/temp/fishing!!fishingrod}addprefix[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/fishingrod/]getindex[maximuminterval]else{$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/fishingrod!!maximuminterval}]}}} newinterval={{{[{$:/temp/fishing!!fishingrod}addprefix[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/fishingrod/]getindex[newinterval]else{$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/fishingrod!!newinterval}]}}} startingease={{{[{$:/temp/fishing!!fishingrod}addprefix[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/fishingrod/]getindex[startingease]else{$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/fishingrod!!startingease}]}}} lastfactor={{{[all[current]get[factor]else]}}} lastinterval={{{[all[current]get[interval]else]}}} againivl={{{[multiplymin]}}} hardivl={{{[add[1]]=[all[current]get[due]delay[]divide[4]floor[]addmultiplymultiply]+[maxall[]min]}}} goodivl={{{[add[1]]=[all[current]get[due]delay[]divide[2]floor[]addmultiplymultiply]+[maxall[]min]}}} easyivl={{{[add[1]]=[all[current]get[due]delay[]addmultiplymultiplymultiply]+[maxall[]min]}}} >
{{$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/fishingpond}}
<$fieldmangler> <$list filter="again hard good easy" variable="ease" > <$let easetip={{{[addsuffix[tip]]}}} > <$button tooltip={{{[{$:/language}removeprefix[$:/]addprefix[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/]getindex]~[[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/languages/en-GB]getindex]}}} aria-label={{{[{$:/language}removeprefix[$:/]addprefix[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/]getindex]~[[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/languages/en-GB]getindex]}}} class="tc-btn-invisible tc-tiddlylink" style={{{[match[again]then[margin-left:10px;color:red;]]~[match[hard]then[margin-left:10px;color:black;]]~[match[good]then[margin-left:10px;color:green;]]~[match[easy]then[margin-left:10px;color:blue;]]}}} > <$action-setfield factor={{{[match[again]thensubtract[0.2]max[1.3]]~[match[hard]thensubtract[0.15]max[1.3]]~[match[good]thenmax[1.3]]~[match[easy]thenadd[0.15]max[1.3]]+[fixed[2]]}}} interval={{{[match[again]then]~[match[hard]then]~[match[good]then]~[match[easy]then]+[fixed[2]]}}} due={{{[match[again]then]~[match[hard]then]~[match[good]then]~[match[easy]then]+[fixed[2]due[]]}}} /> <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler={{{[{$:/temp/fishing!!fish}addprefix[$:/state/folded/]]}}} /> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/temp/fishing" text="" type="" fish={{{[subfilter{$:/temp/fishing!!fishingrod}subfilter{$:/temp/fishing!!fishingpond}first[]]}}} /> <$action-setfield $tiddler={{{[{$:/temp/fishing!!fish}addprefix[$:/state/folded/]]}}} text={{{[{$:/temp/fishing!!fish}search:caption:literal[{{||Excerpt}}]then[show]else[hide]]}}} /> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-add-tag" $param="?" /> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-close-tiddler" /> <$action-navigate $to={{$:/temp/fishing!!fish}} /> <$text text={{{[{$:/language}removeprefix[$:/]addprefix[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/]getindex]~[[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/languages/en-GB]getindex]}}}/> <$button popup=<> tooltip={{{[{$:/language}removeprefix[$:/]addprefix[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/]getindex[moretip]]~[[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/languages/en-GB]getindex[moretip]]}}} aria-label={{{[{$:/language}removeprefix[$:/]addprefix[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/]getindex[moretip]]~[[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/languages/en-GB]getindex[moretip]]}}} class="tc-btn-invisible tc-tiddlylink" style="margin-left:10px;" > ⁝ <$reveal state=<> type="popup" position="aboveleft" animate="yes" >
<$button tooltip={{{[{$:/language}removeprefix[$:/]addprefix[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/]getindex[removetip]]~[[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/languages/en-GB]getindex[removetip]]}}} tc-tiddlylink" style="padding:3px 10px;" > <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-remove-tag" $param="?" /> <$action-deletefield due factor interval /> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/temp/fishing" text="" type="" fish={{{[subfilter{$:/temp/fishing!!fishingrod}subfilter{$:/temp/fishing!!fishingpond}first[]]}}} /> <$action-setfield $tiddler={{{[{$:/temp/fishing!!fish}addprefix[$:/state/folded/]]}}} text="hide" /> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-close-tiddler" /> <$action-navigate $to={{$:/temp/fishing!!fish}} /> <$text text={{{[{$:/language}removeprefix[$:/]addprefix[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/]getindex[remove]]~[[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/languages/en-GB]getindex[remove]]}}}/> <$button tc-tiddlylink" style="padding:3px 10px;" > <$action-deletefield due factor interval /> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/temp/fishing" text="" fish={{{[subfilter{$:/temp/fishing!!fishingrod}subfilter{$:/temp/fishing!!fishingpond}first[]]}}} /> <$action-setfield $tiddler={{{[{$:/temp/fishing!!fish}addprefix[$:/state/folded/]]}}} text="hide" $:/plugins/oflg/fishing/fishingfloat.title: $:/plugins/oflg/fishing/fishingfloat
$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/fishingfloat.caption: {{$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/icon}} <$text text={{{[{$:/language}removeprefix[$:/]addprefix[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/]getindex[fishing]]~[[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/languages/en-GB]getindex[fishing]]}}}/>
$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/fishingfloat.text:
<$button popup=<> tooltip={{{[{$:/language}removeprefix[$:/]addprefix[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/]getindex[fishingbuttontip]]~[[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/languages/en-GB]getindex[fishingbuttontip]]}}} aria-label={{{[{$:/language}removeprefix[$:/]addprefix[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/]getindex[fishingbuttontip]]~[[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/languages/en-GB]getindex[fishingbuttontip]]}}} class=<> selectedClass="tc-selected" > {{$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/icon}} <$reveal state=<> type="popup" position="below" animate="yes" >
{{$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/fishingpond}} {{$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/fishingrod}}

$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/fishingpond.title: $:/plugins/oflg/fishing/fishingpond
$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/fishingpond.text:
<$set
	name="fishingrod"
	value={{$:/temp/fishing!!fishingrod}}
	emptyValue="[tag[?]]"
>
	<$let
		due="[has[due]]-[has[due]!days:due[1]]+[sort[due]reverse[]sortsub:number<priority>reverse[]]"
		undue="[has[due]!days:due[1]sort[due]]"
		new="[!has[due]sort[created]]"
	>
		<$list
			filter="due undue new"
			variable="fishingpondname"
		>
			<$let
				fishingpond={{{[<fishingpondname>match[due]then<due>]~[<fishingpondname>match[undue]then<undue>]~[<fishingpondname>match[new]then<new>]}}}
			>
				<$button
					tooltip={{{[{$:/language}removeprefix[$:/]addprefix[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/]getindex[fishingpondtip]]~[[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/languages/en-GB]getindex[fishingpondtip]]}}}
					aria-label={{{[{$:/language}removeprefix[$:/]addprefix[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/]getindex[fishingpondtip]]~[[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/languages/en-GB]getindex[fishingpondtip]]}}}
					class="tc-btn-invisible tc-tiddlylink"
					style="padding-right:2px;"
				>
					<$action-setfield
						$tiddler="$:/temp/fishing"
						text=""
						fishingrod=<<fishingrod>>
						fishingpond=<<fishingpond>>
						fish={{{[subfilter<fishingrod>subfilter<fishingpond>first[]]}}}
					/>
					<$action-setfield
						$tiddler={{{[{$:/temp/fishing!!fish}addprefix[$:/state/folded/]]}}}
						text={{{[{$:/temp/fishing!!fish}search:caption:literal[{{||Excerpt}}]then[show]else[hide]]}}}
					/>
					<$action-navigate
						$to={{$:/temp/fishing!!fish}}
					/>
					<$action-popup
						$state=<<qualify "$:/state/popup/$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/fishingdeck">>
						$coords=""
					/>
					<$text text={{{[{$:/language}removeprefix[$:/]addprefix[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/]getindex<fishingpondname>]~[[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/languages/en-GB]getindex<fishingpondname>]}}}/><$count filter="[subfilter<fishingrod>subfilter<fishingpond>]"/>
				</$button>
			</$let>
		</$list>
	</$let>
</$set>

$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/fishingrod.title: $:/plugins/oflg/fishing/fishingrod
$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/fishingrod.text:
<$edit-text tiddler="$:/temp/fishing" field="fishingrod" tag="input" focus="true" placeholder="[tag[?]]" inputActions='<$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/temp/fishing" fish=""/>' />
<$reveal default={{{[all[tiddlers+shadows]removeprefix[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/fishingrod/]count[]]}}} type="gt" text="0" animate="yes" > <$button tooltip={{{[{$:/language}removeprefix[$:/]addprefix[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/]getindex[commonfiltertip]]~[[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/languages/en-GB]getindex[commonfiltertip]]}}} aria-label={{{[{$:/language}removeprefix[$:/]addprefix[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/]getindex[commonfiltertip]]~[[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/languages/en-GB]getindex[commonfiltertip]]}}} popup=<> class="tc-btn-invisible" style="margin:0;padding:0 5px;width:auto;height:auto;" > {{$:/core/images/down-arrow}} <$reveal state=<> type="popup" position="below" animate="yes" >
<$list filter="[all[tiddlers+shadows]removeprefix[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/fishingrod/]sort[title]]" variable="fishingrod" > <$button tooltip={{{[{$:/language}removeprefix[$:/]addprefix[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/]getindex[fillfiltertip]]~[[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/languages/en-GB]getindex[fillfiltertip]]+[addsuffix]}}} aria-label={{{[{$:/language}removeprefix[$:/]addprefix[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/]getindex[fillfiltertip]]~[[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/languages/en-GB]getindex[fillfiltertip]]+[addsuffix]}}} popup=<> class="tc-btn-invisible" > <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/temp/fishing" fishingrod=<> /> <$text text=<>/>
<$reveal default={{{[{$:/temp/fishing!!fishingrod}]}}} type="nomatch" text="" animate="yes" > <$reveal default={{{[{$:/temp/fishing!!fishingrod}addprefix[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/fishingrod/]is[missing]]}}} type="nomatch" text="" animate="yes" > <$button tooltip={{{[{$:/language}removeprefix[$:/]addprefix[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/]getindex[pinfiltertip]]~[[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/languages/en-GB]getindex[pinfiltertip]]+[addsuffix{$:/temp/fishing!!fishingrod}]}}} aria-label={{{[{$:/language}removeprefix[$:/]addprefix[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/]getindex[pinfiltertip]]~[[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/languages/en-GB]getindex[pinfiltertip]]+[addsuffix{$:/temp/fishing!!fishingrod}]}}} class="tc-btn-invisible" style="margin:0;padding:0 5px;" > <$action-setfield $tiddler={{{[{$:/temp/fishing!!fishingrod}addprefix[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/fishingrod/]]}}} type="application/json" /> {{$:/core/images/new-button}} <$reveal default={{{[{$:/temp/fishing!!fishingrod}addprefix[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/fishingrod/]is[missing]]}}} type="match" text="" animate="yes" >
<$button popup=<> tooltip={{{[{$:/language}removeprefix[$:/]addprefix[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/]getindex[adjustscheduletip]]~[[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/languages/en-GB]getindex[adjustscheduletip]]+[addsuffix{$:/temp/fishing!!fishingrod}]}}} aria-label={{{[{$:/language}removeprefix[$:/]addprefix[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/]getindex[adjustscheduletip]]~[[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/languages/en-GB]getindex[adjustscheduletip]]+[addsuffix{$:/temp/fishing!!fishingrod}]}}} class="tc-btn-invisible" style="margin:0;padding:0 5px;" > {{$:/core/images/options-button}} <$reveal state=<> type="popup" position="below" animate="yes" >
<$list filter="startingease intervalmodifier newinterval hardinterval easybonus graduatinginterval maximuminterval" variable="parameter" >
<$text text={{{[{$:/language}removeprefix[$:/]addprefix[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/]getindex]~[[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/languages/en-GB]getindex]}}}/><$edit-text tiddler={{{[{$:/temp/fishing!!fishingrod}addprefix[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/fishingrod/]]}}} index=<> placeholder={{{[all[current]get]}}} tag="input" size="4"/>
<$button tooltip={{{[{$:/language}removeprefix[$:/]addprefix[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/]getindex[unpinfiltertip]]~[[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/languages/en-GB]getindex[unpinfiltertip]]+[addsuffix{$:/temp/fishing!!fishingrod}]}}} aria-label={{{[{$:/language}removeprefix[$:/]addprefix[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/]getindex[unpinfiltertip]]~[[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/languages/en-GB]getindex[unpinfiltertip]]+[addsuffix{$:/temp/fishing!!fishingrod}]}}} class="tc-btn-invisible" style="margin:0;padding:0 5px;" > <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler={{{[{$:/temp/fishing!!fishingrod}addprefix[$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/fishingrod/]]}}} /> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/temp/fishing" fishingrod="" /> {{$:/core/images/delete-button}}

$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/icons/setanswer.title: $:/plugins/oflg/fishing/icons/setanswer
$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/icons/setanswer.text:
<svg
  width="22pt"
  height="22pt"
  viewBox="0 0 128 128"
  xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"
  class="tc-image-bold tc-image-button"
>
  <g>
    <text
      transform="matrix(2.56467, 0, 0, 6.78366, -70.4793, -361.722)"
      font-weight="bold"
      xml:space="preserve"
      text-anchor="start"
      font-size="24"
      id="svg_5"
      y="71.27162"
      x="26.8242"
      stroke-width="0"
      >
        →
      </text>
    <text
      transform="matrix(3.88287, 0, 0, 6.21184, -350.205, -233.081)"
      font-weight="bold"
      xml:space="preserve"
      text-anchor="start"
      font-size="24"
      y="56.16649"
      x="106.39803"
      stroke-width="0"
      id="svg_2"
    >
      A
    </text>
  </g>
</svg>

      y="56.16649"
      x="106.39803"
      stroke-width="0"
      id="svg_2"
    >
      S
    </text>
  </g>
</svg>

$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/macros.title: $:/plugins/oflg/fishing/macros
$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/macros.text:
\define priority() [get[caption]search-replace[{{||],[]search-replace[}}],[]tag[questiontemplate]count[]]=[get[due]delay[]]=[backlinks[]count[]]=[links[]has[due]count[]negate[]]=[links[]has[due]!days:due[1]count[]]+[sum[]add{!!priority}multiply{!!factor}fixed[2]]

\define fishbreadcrumbs()

<$let
	currentTiddler={{{[<currentTiddler>tags[]]:intersection[<currentTiddler>backlinks[]]+[first[]]}}}
>
	<$reveal
		default=<<currentTiddler>>
		type="nomatch"
		text=""
	>
		<<fishbreadcrumbs>>
	</$reveal>
	<$reveal
		default=<<currentTiddler>>
		type="nomatch"
		text=""
	>
		{{||$:/core/ui/TagTemplate}} >
	</$reveal>
</$let>

\end

$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/readme.title: $:/plugins/oflg/fishing/readme
$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/readme.text:
Installation and usage tutorial is available at [[Fishing Manual|https://oflg.github.io/fishing/]].

可在 [[钓鱼手册|https://oflg.github.io/fishing/]] 查看安装使用教程。

$:/plugins/oflg/fishing/style.css.title: $:/plugins/oflg/fishing/style.css

Answer.title: Answer
Answer.text:
{{!!title}}
<$reveal
	default={{$:/temp/fishing!!fish}}
	type="match"
	text=<<currentTiddler>>
	animate="yes"
>
	<$edit
		tiddler="$:/temp/fishing"
		placeholder={{$:/language/EditTemplate/Body/Placeholder}}
		minHeight="15px"
		class="tc-edit-texteditor tc-edit-texteditor-body"
	>
		<$set
			value=<<currentTiddler>>
			name="targetTiddler"
		>
			<$list
				filter="[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/EditorToolbar]!has[draft.of]]"
			>
				<$reveal
					type="nomatch"
					state=<<config-visibility-title>>
					text="hide"
					class="tc-text-editor-toolbar-item-wrapper"
					style="display: none;"
				>
					<$transclude
						tiddler="$:/core/ui/EditTemplate/body/toolbar/button"
						mode="inline"
					/>
				</$reveal>
			</$list>
			<$list
				filter="[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/EditorTools]!has[draft.of]]"
			>
				<$list
					filter={{!!condition}}
					variable="list-condition"
				>
					<$transclude/>
				</$list>
			</$list>
		</$set>
	</$edit>
	<$reveal
		default={{$:/temp/fishing}}
		type="nomatch"
		text=""
		animate="yes"
	>
		<$reveal
			state=<<folded-state>>
			type="match"
			text="show"
			animate="yes"
		>
			<$diff-text
				source={{$:/temp/fishing}}
				dest={{!!text}}
			/>
		</$reveal>
	</$reveal>
</$reveal>

Cloze.title: Cloze
Cloze.text:
<$reveal
	state=<<folded-state>>
	type="nomatch"
	text="show"
	animate="yes"
>
	<$reveal
		default={{$:/temp/fishing!!fish}}
		type="nomatch"
		text=<<currentTiddler>>
		animate="yes"
	>
		{{!!title}}
	</$reveal>
	<$reveal
		default={{$:/temp/fishing!!fish}}
		type="match"
		text=<<currentTiddler>>
		animate="yes"
	>
		<$reveal
			default={{{[{!!title}search:title[^^__]]}}}
			type="nomatch"
			text=""
			animate="yes"
		>
			<$list
				filter="[{!!title}split[__]]"
				variable="titleitem"
			>
				<$reveal
					default={{{[<titleitem>search[^^]]}}}
					type="match"
					text=""
				>
					<<titleitem>>
				</$reveal>
				<$reveal
					default={{{[<titleitem>search[^^]]}}}
					type="nomatch"
					text=""
				>
					<$let
						clozecontent={{{[<titleitem>split[^^]first[]]}}}
						clozeid={{{[<titleitem>split[^^]rest[]]}}}
						content={{{[[$:/temp/fishing]getindex<clozeid>match[show]then<clozecontent>else[`    `]]}}}
					>
						<$button
							class="tc-btn-invisible tc-tiddlylink"
						>
							<$action-setfield
								$tiddler="$:/temp/fishing"
								$index=<<clozeid>>
								$value={{{[[$:/temp/fishing]getindex<clozeid>match[show]then[]else[show]]}}}
							/>
								<<content>>^^<<clozeid>>^^
						</$button>
					</$let>
				</$reveal>
			</$list>
		</$reveal>
		<$reveal
			default={{{[{!!title}search:title[^^__]]}}}
			type="match"
			text=""
			animate="yes"
		>
			{{!!title}}
		</$reveal>
	</$reveal>
</$reveal>
<$reveal
	state=<<folded-state>>
	type="match"
	text="show"
	animate="yes"
>
	{{!!title}}
</$reveal>

Excerpt.title: Excerpt
Excerpt.text:
<$reveal
	default={{{[{!!title}search:title[/]]}}}
	type="nomatch"
	text=""
	animate="yes"
>
	<$text
		text={{{[{!!text}split[]limit[13]join[]addsuffix[...]]}}}
	/>
</$reveal>
<$reveal
	default={{{[{!!title}search:title[/]]}}}
	type="match"
	text=""
	animate="yes"
>
	{{!!title}}
</$reveal>

Select.title: Select
Select.text:
<$reveal
	default={{$:/temp/fishing!!fish}}
	type="nomatch"
	text=<<currentTiddler>>
	animate="yes"
>
	{{!!title}}
</$reveal>
<$reveal
	default={{$:/temp/fishing!!fish}}
	type="match"
	text=<<currentTiddler>>
	animate="yes"
>
	<$reveal
		default={{{[{!!title}search:title[^^__]]}}}
		type="nomatch"
		text=""
		animate="yes"
	>
		{{{[{!!title}split[__]first[]]}}}
		<$list
			filter="[{!!title}split[__]search[^^]]"
			variable="titleitem"
		>
			<$let
				optionid={{{[<titleitem>split[^^]rest[]]}}}
				optioncontent={{{[<titleitem>split[^^]first[]]}}}
				selectid={{{[{!!title}split[__]search[^^]search['']count[]match[1]then[id]else<optionid>]}}}
			>
				<$reveal
					state=<<folded-state>>
					type="nomatch"
					text="show"
					animate="yes"
				>

					<$reveal
						default={{{[{!!title}split[__]search[^^]search['']count[]]}}}
						type="lteq"
						text="1"
					>
						<$radio
							tiddler="$:/temp/fishing"
							index=<<selectid>>
							value=<<optionid>>
							default=""
						>
							<<optionid>>. {{{[<optioncontent>search-replace:g:[''],[]]}}}
						</$radio>
					</$reveal>
					<$reveal
						default={{{[{!!title}split[__]search[^^]search['']count[]]}}}
						type="gt"
						text="1"
					>
						<$checkbox
							tiddler="$:/temp/fishing"
							index=<<selectid>>
							checked=<<optionid>>
							unchecked=""
							default=""
						>
							<<optionid>>. {{{[<optioncontent>search-replace:g:[''],[]]}}}
						</$checkbox>
					</$reveal>
				</$reveal>
				<$reveal
					state=<<folded-state>>
					type="match"
					text="show"
					animate="yes"
				>

					<$button
						disabled="yes"
						class="tc-btn-invisible"
					>
						<$reveal
							default={{{[<optioncontent>search['']then[1]else[0]]=[[$:/temp/fishing]getindex<selectid>match<optionid>then[1]else[0]]+[join[]]}}}
							type="match"
							text="00"
							animate="yes"
						>
							{{$:/core/images/blank}}
						</$reveal>
						<$reveal
							default={{{[<optioncontent>search['']then[1]else[0]]=[[$:/temp/fishing]getindex<selectid>match<optionid>then[1]else[0]]+[join[]]}}}
							type="match"
							text="01"
							animate="yes"
						>
							{{$:/core/images/close-button}}
						</$reveal>
						<$reveal
							default={{{[<optioncontent>search['']then[1]else[0]]=[[$:/temp/fishing]getindex<selectid>match<optionid>then[1]else[0]]+[join[]]}}}
							type="match"
							text="10"
							animate="yes"
						>
							{{$:/core/images/warning}}
						</$reveal>
						<$reveal
							default={{{[<optioncontent>search['']then[1]else[0]]=[[$:/temp/fishing]getindex<selectid>match<optionid>then[1]else[0]]+[join[]]}}}
							type="match"
							text="11"
							animate="yes"
						>
							{{$:/core/images/done-button}}
						</$reveal>
					</$button> <<optionid>>. {{{[<optioncontent>search-replace:g:[''],[]]}}}
				</$reveal>
			</$let>
		</$list>
		
		{{{[{!!title}split[__]reverse[]first[]]}}}
	</$reveal>
	<$reveal
		default={{{[{!!title}search:title[^^__]]}}}
		type="match"
		text=""
		animate="yes"
	>
		{{!!title}}
	</$reveal>
</$reveal>
